entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then periods of snow beginning after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
